VehicleInformation.title: Vehicle Information
VehicleInformation.description: Please provide information about your vehicle.

AccidentDetails.title: Accident Details
AccidentDetails.description: Please provide detailed information about the accident.
AccidentDetails.locationPlaceholder: Enter the address or location where the accident occurred
AccidentDetails.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe what happened in detail...
AccidentDetails.friendlyReportDescription: Please upload a scanned copy or photo of the friendly accident report.
AccidentDetails.bodilyInjuriesDescriptionLong: Please provide details about the injuries sustained in the accident.
AccidentDetails.bodilyInjuriesPlaceholderShort: Describe injuries and medical attention received...
AccidentDetails.bodilyInjuriesPlaceholderLong: Describe the nature and extent of the injuries, who was injured, and any medical attention received...

DamageDocumentation.title: Damage Documentation
DamageDocumentation.description: Please provide a detailed description of the vehicle damage and attach photos if available.
DamageDocumentation.damageDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the damage to your vehicle in detail...
DamageDocumentation.damagePhotosDescription: Upload clear photos showing the damage to your vehicle if available.

InvolvedParties.title: Involved Parties
InvolvedParties.description: List all parties involved in the accident.
InvolvedParties.driversQuestion: Were other drivers involved in the accident?
InvolvedParties.driversHint: Select 'Yes' if there were other vehicles/drivers involved in the incident.
InvolvedParties.driverDialogDescription: Enter the details of the other driver involved in the accident.
InvolvedParties.addDriverHint: Click 'Add Driver' to add information about other drivers involved.
InvolvedParties.witnessesQuestion: Were there any witnesses to the accident?
InvolvedParties.witnessesHint: Select 'Yes' if anyone witnessed the accident and can provide a statement.
InvolvedParties.witnessDialogDescription: Enter the details of a witness to the accident.
InvolvedParties.statementPlaceholder: Witness statement or description of what they saw
InvolvedParties.addWitnessHint: Click 'Add Witness' to add information about witnesses to the accident.
InvolvedParties.name: Name
